entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snowshower, -7.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Sault Ste. Marie Airport 12:47 PM EST Sunday 29 January 2023
Condition: Light Snowshower
Temperature: -7.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 74 %

Dewpoint: -11.7°C

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 early this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. Temperature steady near minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 11.
